# FromToByAction.TransformMode

**Enumeration**

Options available to determine the space the bound entity should be relative to.

## Declaration

```swift
enum TransformMode
```

## Overview

The [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/FromToByAction] structure accepts this enumeration as an initializer argument when the [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/FromToByAction] value is a [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/Transform] type.

## Enumeration Cases

- **FromToByAction.TransformMode.local**: The provided transforms are relative to the transform of the bound entity.
- **FromToByAction.TransformMode.parent**: The provided transforms are relative to the bound entities parent transform.
- **FromToByAction.TransformMode.relative(to:)**: The provided transforms are relative to the resolved entities transform.
- **FromToByAction.TransformMode.scene**: The provided transform is relative to the scene, in world space.

## Type Properties

- **default**: Default transform mode used by the specializations which use transform mode.

## Conforms To

- Decodable
- Encodable
- Equatable
